mapper.select: -- SELECT * FROM `class` SELECT c.class_no, c.class_name, c.class_schedule, c.subject_no, c.member_no, s.subject_name, -- 과목 이름 m.name -- 관련인 이름 FROM `class` c JOIN subject s ON c.subject_no = s.subject_no -- 과목과 연결 JOIN member m ON c.member_no = m.member_no -- 관련인과 연결
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `class` (class_name, class_schedule, subject_no, member_no) VALUES (#{class_name}, #{class_schedule}, #{subject_no}, #{member_no})
